Articles.Content:
Falso.

The user below me has an unorganized desk or computer space.

Well, I did have to take my computer out of the place where it usually is to rearrange cords and stuff.

The user below me needs to do a hack-and-slash reinstall of their computer. (Reinstall windows/mac/linux/whatever because you have too many programs running)

Nope. Itunes and Chrome.

The user below me does not use Internet Explorer.

False...just cleaned it up yesterday

The user below me is male

False, I use Firefox, Chrome and IE, but I like to float around (use chrome for a couple of days, then use firefox etc.)

True, NINJA'd

The user below me actually knows about my programs. That I spend most of my time working on. Because I have nothing better to do.

Yes I do (I've tried Carbon)

The user below me is a potato.

Wrong, I'm german.......so, there a certain similarities....

The user below me likes coffee

Tea.

The user below me has seen this.

Well, I just watched it so true. However, if you meant that as in seeing the video prior, then false.

The user below me was born on Earth.

Born no. Built no. Fell from sky and stranded here, yes.

The user below me has played FTL: Faster Than Light.

No but I have gone faster than the speed of light. *turns on flashlight*

The person below m a

h t t

e e

s m

he

kraken

!

...Mkay.

The person below me has eaten something in the last hour.

True.

Italian French Toast.

The user below me was not expecting me.

False - I remember you from the rate my Avatar thread

*cough*Kane lives in death!*cough*

The user below me had a hot beverage in the last hour.

False.

Frigid Kool-Aid.

The user below me is not the user 2 above me.

True - duh! However, I am above and below.

The user below me has an I-Phone.

False. I''ve never owned a cellular device.

The user below me is True.

What is True? If by name, NO.

The next user can be more specific to the user below him/her.

I'll try my best.

Yes I do (I've tried Carbon)

Then you'll be happy of what I'm working on right now.

The user below me knows what I mean by this.

*head asplode*

The user below me is an a-*head asplode*

False, I am not a *head asplode*.

The user below me wants me to work on something other than Carbon.

False - I don't realy care what you are working on

The user below me has built an SSTO

True, though you failed to specify if it worked at all.

The user below me is not me.

True

The user below me build a workin space-plane

False, still attempting to build a good plane...

The next user can build an interplanetary space plane.
